trans-unit.target: Domyślny ciąg specyficzne dla kultury są dostarczane przez program .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether server controls in the catalog display their associated icons in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia wartość wskazującą, czy formanty serwera w katalogu wyświetlić skojarzone z nimi ikony w katalogu.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls that are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Formanty i innych kontrolek serwera, które są opakowywane jako <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>formantów w czasie wykonywania ma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is the URL to an image that is used as an icon to represent the control in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: Wartość tej właściwości jest adres URL obrazu, który jest używany jako ikona do reprezentowania formantu w katalogu formantów.

trans-unit.source: The ShowCatalogIcons property indicates whether the icons associated with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and other server controls are displayed in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość ShowCatalogIcons wskazuje, czy ikony skojarzone z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>i innych kontrolek serwera są wyświetlane w katalogu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the icons associated with server controls in the catalog should be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli powinny być wyświetlane ikony skojarzone z formantami serwera w katalogu; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Wartość domyślna to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData*> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Implementuje <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metody przez wywołanie metody <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData*>metody <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"> </xref> klasy</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ten element jest jawną implementacją elementu interfejsu.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>interfejsu.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The method simply calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class, which in turn processes the state of the check boxes in a catalog that correspond to server controls in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Po prostu wywołuje metodę <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>Metoda <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>klasy, która z kolei przetwarza stanu pola wyboru w katalogu, które odpowiadają kontrolek serwera w katalogu.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: Identyfikator klucza dla formantu.

trans-unit.source: The collection of name/value pairs posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja par nazwa/wartość przesłane do serwera.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an event should be raised to indicate that data has changed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Jeśli zdarzenie powinien być wywoływany w celu wskazania, że dane zostały zmienione; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>.
trans-unit.target: Opis tego elementu członkowskiego zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ten element jest jawną implementacją elementu interfejsu.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>interfejsu.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.
trans-unit.target: Śledzi zmiany w stan widoku formantu strefy.

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method first calls the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class to track the view state associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Metoda TrackViewState najpierw wywołuje metodę podstawową <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>klasę, aby śledzić stan widoku skojarzone z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>strefy.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Next, the method begins tracking the view state for the add and close verbs, as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Następnie metoda rozpoczyna śledzenie stanu widoku Dodaj i zamknij zleceń, a także <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>obiekty skojarzone z <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>
